subjects.title: HTML Course
subjects.cardDescription: Learn the basics of HTML, the language used to create webpages.

classes.title: HTML-Introduction
classes.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML in this introductory class.

classes.title: HTML-Structure
classes.description: Explore the structure and layout components of HTML.

classes.title: Basic-Tags-of-HTML
classes.description: Understand the essential tags used in HTML for building web content.

classes.title: html-forms-&-input-tags
classes.description: Discover how to create forms and input tags in HTML.

classes.title: html-tutorial-anchor-tag
classes.description: Master the usage of anchor tags for creating hyperlinks in HTML.

classes.title: html-img-tag
classes.description: Learn how to insert and manipulate images using the img tag in HTML.

classes.title: html-iframe-tag-attribute
classes.description: Explore the iframe tag and its attributes for embedding content in HTML.

subjects.title: CSS Course
subjects.cardDescription: Discover how to style and design webpages using CSS.

classes.title: css-introduction
classes.description: Gain an understanding of what CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is in this introductory class.

classes.title: css-text-property-tutorial
classes.description: Learn how to use the text property in CSS to style text content.

classes.title: css-div-tag-in-html
classes.description: Explore how to apply CSS properties to the div tag in HTML for enhanced styling.

classes.title: css-display-block-and-display-inline
classes.description: Understand the difference between the display block and display inline CSS properties.

classes.title: css-position-property-relative-&-absolute
classes.description: Master the position property in CSS and learn how to use relative and absolute positioning.

classes.title: css-overflow-property
classes.description: Discover how to control overflowing content using the CSS overflow property.

classes.title: css-flexbox-tutorial
classes.description: Learn how to use CSS Flexbox to create flexible and responsive layouts.

classes.title: css-media-queries-explained
classes.description: Learn how to use CSS Flexbox to create flexible and responsive layouts.

subjects.title: ReactJS Course
subjects.cardDescription: Master React, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

classes.title: React JS - React Tutorial (1) React Hooks useState
classes.description: Learn how to use the useState hook in React for managing state in functional components.

classes.title: React JS - React Tutorial (2) React Hooks useEffect
classes.description: Discover how to use the map method to iterate over arrays in React.

classes.title: ReactJS - React Tutorial (3) Array Map Method
classes.description: Learn about React components and various methods associated with them.

classes.title: React JS Component & methods | React Tutorial (4)
classes.description: Understand the difference between the display block and display inline CSS properties.

classes.title: React JS Conditional Rendering | React Tutorial (5)
classes.description: Master conditional rendering techniques in React for rendering components based on conditions.

classes.title: Benefit of React | Npm Packages | React Tutorial (6)
classes.description: Explore the benefits of React and npm packages in this React Tutorial

subjects.title: FireBase Course
subjects.cardDescription: Harness the power of Firebase for developing web and mobile applications.

classes.title: Introducing Firebase Authentication
classes.description: Learn about the features and benefits of Firebase Authentication.

classes.title: How to Store Files on Firebase Firestore
classes.description: Discover how to upload and store files using Firebase Firestore.

classes.title: Firebase Hosting with ReactJS and HTML
classes.description: Explore how to deploy a ReactJS and HTML application to Firebase Hosting.
